fetching_integrations.name: Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Malware Investigation and Response incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Malware Investigation and Response. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Defender For Endpoint Mapper'. 
4. Check the 'Fetch alert evidence' option.
action.new:
Set up new 'Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection' instance to start fetching Malware Investigation and Response incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Malware Investigation and Response. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Defender For Endpoint Mapper'. 
4. Check the 'Fetch alert evidence' option.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'Microsoft Defender for Endpoint' integration to work with your Malware Investigation and Response use case.

fetching_integrations.name: Cortex XDR - IR

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Malware Investigation and Response incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the 'Cortex XDR Incident Handler - Classifier'.
3. Set the Incident type field to 'Malware Investigation and Response' (the XDR classifier will keep on routing other incident types).
4. Set the Mapper field to 'XDR - Incoming Mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'Cortex XDR - IR' instance to work with the Malware Investigation and Response incident type: 
1. Turn on fetching. 
2. Choose the 'Cortex XDR Incident Handler - Classifier .
3. Set the Incident type field to 'Malware Investigation and Response' (the XDR classifier will keep on routing other incident types).
4. Set the Mapper field to 'XDR - Incoming Mapper'.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'Cortex XDR - IR' integration to work with your Malware Investigation and Response use case.
